1.0.1.en: Take Homey's TZ into consideration in the UI

1.0.2.en: Fixed devices not restoring during capacity shortfall. Burst rate now only limited in last 10 minutes of the hour. Added dry-run warning banner. Added end-of-hour indicator in plan view.

1.0.3.en: Improved settings UI with better spacing and navigation. Added stale data warning banner. Improved price display with collapsible summary. Renamed insights driver with new icon.

1.0.4.en: Fix shortfall detection during end of hour

1.0.5.en: Renaming modes should now be safe

1.1.0.en: Added new card for when operating mode changes

1.1.1.en: Improved flow card UX: removed parentheses from report power card title and added helpful usage hints. All flow cards now provide clear guidance on how to use them with practical examples.

1.3.0.en: New flow condition: “Headroom for device” to check if a device can safely increase its consumption by X kW.

1.3.1.en: More robust headroom calculation for device

1.4.0.en: Upgrade the plan UI with more structured details

1.5.0.en: Added configurable overshoot shedding per device (turn off vs minimum temperature), plus updated UI and docs to support it.

1.5.2.en: Gate sheds and swaps on measurements

1.5.3.en: Coordinated price optimization and capacity planning, plus various bug‑fix tests and safeguards.

1.5.4.en: Improved plan behavior and clarity: plan status reasons simplified, shed temps validated on repeated overshoot, and power estimation unified for restore logic.

1.5.5.en: Large refactor of the codebase and various bugfixes.
